mapper.select: select * from team_record order by id desc limit 0,50;
mapper.insert: insert into team_record(user_id,username,past_team) values(#{sUserId},(select username from user where user.id = #{xUserId}),(select name from team where numbers = #{xNumbers}))
mapper.update: update team_record set current_team = (select name from team where numbers = #{iNumbers}), change_date = (date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s')) where user_id = #{iUserId}
